variables.name: INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The content:// style URI for the internal storage.

variables.name: EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment:
* The content:// style URI for the "primary" external storage
             * volume.

variables.name: CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type for this table.

variables.name: DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER
variables.comment: * The default sort order for this table

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUri(String volumeName)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for the video media table on the
             * given volume.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @return the URI to the video media table on the given volume

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUri(@NonNull String volumeName, long id)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for a single row in the videos table
             * on the given volume.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @param id the video to get the URI for
             * @return the URI to the videos table on the given volume

methodNames: public static Uri getContentUri(@NonNull String volumeName, long id)
